data.title: Massimo Group (NASDAQ: MAMO) forms AI robotics division to enter global automation and smart-systems markets
data.description: Massimo Group forms Massimo AI Technology to develop industrial automation and logistics robotics, aiming to diversify revenue and expand beyond powersports and EVs.
data.author: Stock Titan
data.keywords: Massimo Group, MAMO, Massimo AI Technology, AI robotics division, industrial automation, logistics robotics, technology roadmap, manufacturing
